title: Newly Remodeled 2 bed, 2 bath Condo in Downtown Long Beach
posting_body: I have a 2 bed, 2 bath condo in Downtown Long Beach.
This condo is the top corner unit of a 3 story building with views facing San Pedro & gets great sunset views from the living room.
The condo was very recently renovated and contains brand new kitchen appliances, cupboards, and floors throughout the entire unit.

Located near the corner of 3rd and Chestnut, this unit is in a very lively neighborhood within walking distance to Pine Ave where many bars and restaurants are located as well as the beach, Shoreline Park, and the Pike Shopping Center.

This unit contains 2 private parking spots in an indoor gated garage, 2 additional guest passes in the garage, washer and dryer on each floor of the condo, a public rooftop area, call box access into the building, & an attic that can be used for storage covering most of the space above the Master Closet & Master Bedroom.
Looking for clean, responsible tenants who will take care of the space, and can cover the rent.
Here are the Lease details:
- Utilities to be registered in tenants name (Gas/Electricity/Internet).
- Unit is setup for Frontier Fiber Internet 500/500 Mbps
- 1 year lease
- In bedroom rolling AC unit included in each bedroom
- No animals, no smoking in unit
- First month rent + $3,000 security deposit at move in (Refundable after move out, upon inspection)
Ideal Tenant has:
- Monthly income at least 2x the rent
- Clean eviction report
- Good credit score
- Positive reference checks from past landlords
- Steady employment history
Looking to have someone move in ready by September 1st.
If interested, please reach out and I will share an application.
There is no application fee, however for serious candidates a credit check will be completed through TransUnion SmartMove.
